"Your condition is from shaking too many hands," he says.

Wow. Not a whole lot I can do about that.

So, I've been having increasing pains in my right arm and made my first doctor's appointment in a very long time just to check it out. I've been diagnosed with "Tennis Elbow" (lateral epicondylitis) -- but not from swinging any racquet...

Jack & Will joined several staff members & me for a tour of the traffic control tower at the Shreveport Regional Airport. We had a great time visiting with constituents across Natchitoches, Evangeline and Red River Parishes during our town halls this week. It’s my great honor to represent the 760,000 constituents of #LA04, & I will continue to ensure your voice is heard back in our nation’s capital. pic.twitter.com/vB17CBWVSN

Special thanks to the center's founder, Claire Prymus, for her tour and hospitality, and to Natchitoches Parish President Rick Nowlin for joining us! Go by and visit, and you'll be blessed! pic.twitter.com/WE3UrpfOWU

After my town hall in Natchitoches yesterday, we enjoyed our lunch at the awesome Legacy Cafe. The cafe offers young people ages 16-24 invaluable job and life skills training with support to overcome barriers to employment. Plus, the food and service are EXCELLENT!
